nodes.bodyText: Can we make the default 0? I don't see the point of having this printed out every 60 seconds OOTB.

nodes.bodyText:
I'm fine either way making it 0 now, I can update those defaults. If we still want to see the logging on some of the nighties we could adjust this.
I think even going to something like 5 or 10 minutes (instead of 1 minute) would be easier to parse.
